body: Day 51 - 1243* I can understand using honorifics, even if I would prefer big brother being used instead of Onii-chan or whatever japanese bullshit they normally use. Using baka and Arigatou, however, I can't accept, you're supposed to translate the manga not do half of it and say fuck it before posting. 3/10.

I'm not sorry but if you read this comment, you'll have a girlfriend in the next few months. To activate this blessing, paste this in other comment sections 3 times... don't really believe in this stuff, personally, but I figured "hey, why not? couldn't hurt, at the very least."
Now i want to wear panties on my head
